56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:A man came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said, "O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)! I have enlisted in the army for such-andsuch Ghazwa, and my wife is leaving for Hajj." Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Go back and perform Hajj with your wife

chapter.eng-name: The listing of the people by the Imam
